channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Welcome to the ‘skills mismatch economy’: the shift from roles to skills making your resume—and your job title—meaningless
item.description: Wharton and Accenture partnered on a huge "skills index" that crunched data on 100 million job postings. They found a "striking and persistent disconn...

item.title: McDonald’s CEO shares tough love career advice he’d give Gen Z and young millennial workers: ‘No one cares about your career’
item.description: Your career growth is in your own hands, the CEOs of McDonalds, LinkedIn and Amazon agree—and it's a brutal reality check for Gen Z and millennial wor...

item.title: Built to last: governance for multigenerational family businesses
item.description: When starting a company, nimble decision-making and founder-led intuition are often hallmarks of success. More structure is needed with complexity.

item.title: Why AI’s greatest challenge is leadership, not innovation
item.description: CEOs reveal how AI, social media and bold leadership are shaping the future of business.

item.title: 33-year-old former flight attendant posed as pilot and got hundreds of free tickets over 4-year span, authorities say. Why it worked is a mystery
item.description: Court documents contained no explanation of why, in an industry focused on flight and airport safety, the airlines didn't recognize credentials as inv...

item.title: U.S. stocks jump and ‘fear gauge’ retreats following Trump’s U-turn on Greenland
U.S. initial jobless claims edged up to 200,000 mark in latest week
Wall Street‘s ‘fear gauge’ sheds Greenland premium after Trump’s U-turn
GDP update indicates U.S. economy expanded at 4.4% annual pace in third quarter
Fed-preferred PCE gauge shows U.S. inflation rate remains stuck near 3%
